name: DNS Record Scanner and Enumerator
author: Carlos Perez <carlos_perez@darkoperator.com>
Nixawk
description:
This module can be used to gather information about a domain from a
        given DNS server by performing various DNS queries such as zone
        transfers, reverse lookups, SRV record brute forcing, and other techniques.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: VERBOSE
options.description: Enable detailed status messages

options.name: RPORT
options.description: The target port

options.name: CPORT
options.description: The local client port

options.name: CHOST
options.description: The local client address

options.name: SSL
options.description: Negotiate SSL/TLS for outgoing connections

options.name: SSLVersion
options.description: Specify the version of SSL/TLS to be used (Auto, TLS and SSL23 are auto-negotiate) (Accepted: Auto, TLS, SSL23, SSL3, TLS1, TLS1.1, TLS1.2)

options.name: SSLVerifyMode
options.description: SSL verification method (Accepted: CLIENT_ONCE, FAIL_IF_NO_PEER_CERT, NONE, PEER)

options.name: SSLCipher
options.description: String for SSL cipher - "DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA" or "ADH"

options.name: Proxies
options.description: A proxy chain of format type:host:port[,type:host:port][...]

options.name: ConnectTimeout
options.description: Maximum number of seconds to establish a TCP connection

options.name: TCP::max_send_size
options.description: Maxiumum tcp segment size.  (0 = disable)

options.name: TCP::send_delay
options.description: Delays inserted before every send.  (0 = disable)

options.name: DOMAIN
options.description: The target domain

options.name: NS
options.description: Specify the nameservers to use for queries, space separated

options.name: SEARCHLIST
options.description: DNS domain search list, comma separated

options.name: THREADS
options.description: Threads for ENUM_BRT

options.name: DnsClientDefaultNS
options.description: Specify the default to use for queries, space separated

options.name: DnsClientReportARecords
options.description: Add hosts found via BRT and RVL to DB

options.name: DnsClientRVLExistingOnly
options.description: Only perform lookups on hosts in DB

options.name: DnsClientResolvconf
options.description: Resolvconf formatted configuration file to use for Resolver

options.name: DnsNote
options.description: Save all DNS results as notes

options.name: ENUM_AXFR
options.description: Initiate a zone transfer against each NS record

options.name: ENUM_BRT
options.description: Brute force subdomains and hostnames via the supplied wordlist

options.name: ENUM_A
options.description: Enumerate DNS A record

options.name: ENUM_CNAME
options.description: Enumerate DNS CNAME record

options.name: ENUM_MX
options.description: Enumerate DNS MX record

options.name: ENUM_NS
options.description: Enumerate DNS NS record

options.name: ENUM_SOA
options.description: Enumerate DNS SOA record

options.name: ENUM_TXT
options.description: Enumerate DNS TXT record

options.name: ENUM_RVL
options.description: Reverse lookup a range of IP addresses

options.name: ENUM_TLD
options.description: Perform a TLD expansion by replacing the TLD with the IANA TLD list

options.name: ENUM_SRV
options.description: Enumerate the most common SRV records

options.name: STOP_WLDCRD
options.description: Stops bruteforce enumeration if wildcard resolution is detected

options.name: IPRANGE
options.description: The target address range or CIDR identifier

options.name: WORDLIST
options.description: Wordlist of subdomains

options.name: TIMEOUT
options.description: DNS TIMEOUT

options.name: RETRY
options.description: Number of times to try to resolve a record if no response is received

options.name: RETRY_INTERVAL
options.description: Number of seconds to wait before doing a retry

options.name: TCP_DNS
options.description: Run queries over TCP
